title: Knightriders Director George Romero
description:
Knightriders(1981) 145 min
Director/Writer: George A. Romero
Ed Harris: plays Billy(the King)
Tom Savini: plays Morgan(the Black Knight)

A travelling troupe of jousters and performers are slowly cracking under the pressure of hick cops, financial troubles and their failure to live up to their own ideals. The group&#039;s leader, King Billy, is increasingly unable to maintain his warrior&#039;s rule while the Black Knight is being tempted away to LA and stardom, as they all have to ask why they were here in the first place.
